name: Restore (Icoso)
description:
Restore is a game about restoring trees, clouds, bushes, and more to the Earth! Played as a 2D Platformer, you must overcome different enemies and challenges found throughout the adventure! :D

This game was created for the Dani's Basement Jam #2! https://itch.io/jam/danis-basement-jam-2

Please check me out on my social media here! :D

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7FCx3MrwKGYFEs91Lz0yg

Twitter- https://twitter.com/icoso_games

Discord - https://discord.gg/uvMRDUW

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/icoso_games/

Game Engine - Unity3D

Graphics - Aseprite

Music - FL Studio

Sound Effects - Bfxr
